an7.58:1.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, tathagatassa arakkheyyani, tihi ca anupavajjo.
an7.58:1.4: natthi tathagatassa kayaduccaritam yam tathagato rakkheyya:
an7.58:2.2: natthi tathagatassa vaciduccaritam yam tathagato rakkheyya:
an7.58:3.2: natthi tathagatassa manoduccaritam yam tathagato rakkheyya:
an7.58:4.2: natthi tathagatassa micchaajivo yam tathagato rakkheyya:
an7.58:6.3: Tatra vata mam samano va brahmano va devo va maro va brahma va koci va lokasmim sahadhammena paticodessati:
an7.58:6.6: Etamaham, bhikkhave, nimittam asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesarajjappatto viharami.
an7.58:7.1: Supannatta kho pana me, bhikkhave, savakanam nibbanagamini patipada.
an7.58:7.2: Yathapatipanna mama savaka asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti.
an7.58:7.3: Tatra vata mam samano va brahmano va devo va maro va brahma va koci va lokasmim sahadhammena paticodessati:
an7.58:7.4: ‘itipi te na supannatta savakanam nibbanagamini patipada. Yathapatipanna tava savaka asavanam khaya …pe… sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti’ti.
an7.58:7.6: Etamaham, bhikkhave, nimittam asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesarajjappatto viharami.
an7.58:8.1: Anekasata kho pana me, bhikkhave, savakaparisa asavanam khaya …pe… sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti.
an7.58:8.2: Tatra vata mam samano va brahmano va devo va maro va brahma va koci va lokasmim sahadhammena paticodessati:
an7.58:8.3: ‘itipi te na anekasata savakaparisa asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti’ti.
an7.58:8.5: Etamaham, bhikkhave, nimittam asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesarajjappatto viharami.
an7.58:10.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari tathagatassa arakkheyyani, imehi ca tihi anupavajjo”ti.
